name: Just One Bite!! A Dragon Lunch Rush
name_original: Just One Bite!! A Dragon Lunch Rush
description:
Dragon is hungry! Dragon could eat a cow! No, 10 cows! No, 100 cows!!
Just not the ones with two heads--they taste funny.

Press and hold spacebar to turn your nose up at the gross mutant cows; eat three of those and you get sick, empty your stomach, and have to start all over!

A 1-bit game made for 1-Bit Weekend game jam. Everything in this game was made by me, except the Boxy Bold typeface by  Clint Bellanger (edited into .TTF by cemkalyoncu, william.thompsonj, and usr_share).

Had trouble getting it to work in HTML5 so I also exported OSX and WIN versions if you can't play in browser.

Thanks for playing the first game I've ever finished!
